Package index

Description

micronutr-package micronutr
Determining Vitamin and Mineral Status of Populations

Haemoglobinaemia

get_altitude_correction()
Determine altitude correction factor for haemoglobin
get_smoking_correction()
Determine smoking status correction factor for haemoglobin
correct_hb()
Correct haemoglobin based on altitude and/or smoking status
detect_anaemia_u5() detect_anaemia_5to11() detect_anaemia_12to14() detect_anaemia_np_women() detect_anaemia_pregnant() detect_anaemia_men() detect_anaemia()
Determine haemoglobinaemia status for various population groups

Iron deficiency

detect_inflammation() detect_inflammation_crp() detect_inflammation_agp()
Determine inflammation status
correct_ferritin()
Correct serum ferritin values
detect_iron_deficiency_u5() detect_iron_deficiency_5over() detect_iron_deficiency() detect_iron_deficiency_qualitative()
Determine iron storage status

Iodine intake

detect_iodine() detect_iodine_general() detect_iodine_pregnant() detect_iodine_lactating()
Determine population level iodine intake status

Datasets

mnData
Micronutrient survey data
